system.description:
**Primary Energy:** Earth 6 (creating temporary passage)  
**Supporting Energy:** Space 1 (close range) / Time 2 (duration 1 minute)  
**Range:** Close, 30 ft.  
**Duration:** 1 minute  
**Total Cost:** 9 Energy  
**Action:** Complex weave (2 actions)  
**Weaving Roll:** Earth Potential + Earth Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery  
**Effect:** Create a passage at close range up to 5 feet wide, 8 feet tall, and 20 feet deep through wood, plaster, or stone. When weave ends, creatures still in passage are ejected safely.  
**Saving Throw:** None (environmental manipulation)  
**Success Scaling:** 0 = fails, 1 = 10 feet deep (1 round), 2 = full effect, 3 = 40 feet deep (10 minutes), 4 = permanent passage
